title: Touch Back by Colormark Temporary Hair Color Marker Rich Black
description: TouchBack instant touch-up is the fastest touch-up for gray roots. TouchBack actually bonds to the hair, blending seamlessly with permanent hair color for a totally natural look. (Unlike hair mascaras, crayons, gels and powders, which dull the hair and flake off.)

title: Obagi Nu-Derm Foaming Gel -- 6.7 fl oz
description: Obagi Foaming Gel combines a blend of herbs, natural cleansers and Aloe Vera to create this gentle formula. It frees your skin of pollutants and excess oils without damaging the skins own natural moisture content. It leaves even oily skin clean and touchably soft.

title: Dr.'s Remedy Enriched Nail Polish .5 fl oz - Rescue Red
description: Dr.'s Remedy Enriched Nail Polish - a polish that actually promotes healthier nails! If you have discolored nails, allergies to chemicals in commercial nail polish or just looking for a healthier alternative, try the only over-the-counter nail polish created by doctors to be free from the most harmful toxins. Dr.'s Remedy contains no formaldehyde, DBP and toluene (known toxic chemicals) and enriched with tea tree oil and garlic bulb extract, with naturally occurring anti-fungal ingredients, as well as wheat protein and Vitamins C and E. title: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion - 1 oz
description: Our best selling product, Mario Badescu's Drying Lotion is an excellent spot treatment made with a blend of Calamine and Salicylic Acid to clear up and soothe unsightly whiteheads overnight. A dab of this lotion will heal and dry pimples quickl

title: WEN By Chaz Dean Intensive Treatment Oil 2 Fl. Oz. (Pomegranate Rosemary 2 Oz)
description: WEN Treatment Oils are a unique blend of the world's rarest and most beneficial oils. Combining the nourishing and moisturizing properties of Argan Oil with the restorative and healing properties of Abyssinan Oil, the WEN Treatment Oils hydrate, nourish and help repair both your hair and skin. It is a non-greasy formula that may be used daily. Bask in the heavenly mixture of natural fragrant oils while providing yourself with a highly restorative and moisturizing treatment meant to maintain and replenish the health and integrity of you hair, scalp and body. , 2 Oz bottle

title: Nature's Gate Glow Lotion, medium skin tones, 16 Ounce Bottle
description: Nature's Gate Glow Lotion for medium skin tones provides a gradual, even and natural looking glow while hydrating and nourishing skin. Skin protecting antioxidants are combined with 7 skin conditioning moisturizers, leaving skin supple and touchably soft. Use daily for healthy looking, sun-kissed skin year round.

title: Swisspers Cotton Balls, Organic, 80 ct
description: Certified OrganicSwisspers Organic cotton balls use only virgin staple fiber that makes superior cotton balls that are noticeably softer. Grown Purely on Organic FarmsThe organic farming methods replenish the soil, protect the purity of air, water and food supplies, and preserve precious resources. Swisspers Organic cotton is grown by a cooperative of family-owned farms. These fields are regularly inspected by independent certifiers to ensure the very highest standards of organic practices.
